Summary: Over 1 mile wide and 2 miles long
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ross-on-Wye
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailslarge disc like object that glowed red\orange emerged from a localised cloud to the object (like independence day). cloud disappeared and object flew overhead heading due south. when overhead it had a triangular tail approx 25o\o of the diameter of the circumfernce to a point equal in length to the width of the disc. i have seen a total 17 to 19 ufo's from 2007 this one was the biggest. all the ufo's i have seen have been in the month of october except once april this year. just thought you might like to know
